# thetalake_export (Data Source)

Theta Lake Export Data Source. Retrieves information about an export.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_export" "example" {
  id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Export ID

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description
- `download_url` (String) URL to download the export
- `format` (String) Export format
- `name` (String) Export Name
- `query_id` (Number) Query ID
- `status` (String) Export status
